title: How many pages can you read in an hour? - Quora

response.answer_text: The number of pages to be read depends upon our mood of reading and the level of knowledge we have on that particular language or subject. Some follow the intensive type of reading and some extensive and some do skim or scan. So the level of my reading speed depends upon my mood that I read 1 pages or 1 book in an hour.
It usually depends on the book. But for the most part, if i'm alone or if no one's bugging me. I can ready about 3–5 chapters in an hour.
